<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Riding Pony](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3057)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Riding Pony](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3057)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +4; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +4, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 16

</row>

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=54)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +5,
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The riding pony Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

</column>

name: Riding Pony
